title: Ticket #2691: NO_DNS doomed connect() to collector port 1980 in condor_netdb
description:
Since at least 7.0.0 (2008) and probably earlier, when NO_DNS is TRUE, condor_gethostname in /src/condor_util_lib/condor_netdb.cpp (aka condor_netdb.c) has attempted to connect to the collector (or at least the IP address associated with the collector) on port 1980. This seems doomed. I suspect it has been failing for years without notice; the only error is emitted to D_HOSTNAME.

The code in question should be either fixed or removed.
